LanguageData.WNA_Mortar.label: mortar ball
LanguageData.WNA_Mortar.description: A slab with a rite on it, can automatically form a big mana ball that looks like a black hole. It's usually used as mortar.
LanguageData.WNA_Mortar_Gun.label: mortar ball
LanguageData.WNA_Mortar_Gun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: mortar ball
LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Lancer.label: lancer ball
LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Lancer.description: A slab-like facility, can automatically form a mana ball and actively attack nearby enemies. It can fire a mana lance to a long distance.
LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Lancer_Gun.label: lancer ball
LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Lancer_Gun_Proj.label: lancer ball
LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Pale.label: pale ball
LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Pale.description: A slab-like facility, can automatically form a mana ball and actively attack nearby enemies.
LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Pale_Gun.label: pale ball
LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Pale_Gun_Proj.label: pale ball
LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Shatter.label: shatter ball
LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Shatter.description: A slab-like facility, can automatically form a mana ball and actively attack nearby enemies. It can cause an explosion and usually powerful enough to blow a person apart.
LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Shatter_Gun.label: shatter ball
LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Shatter_Gun_Proj.label: shatter ball
